document.full_text: the u.n. special envoy on sexual violence in conflict chided the security council on thursday for failing to mention it in two recent resolutions on libya, despite having made the subject a priority.
document.title: u.n. sex violence envoy chides council on libya texts
lines_and_colors: the u.n. special envoy on sexual violence in conflict chided the security council on thursday for failing to mention it in two recent resolutions on libya, despite having made the subject a priority.
